text: Is there any example in HubSpot documentation on how to do registration, login, send email after registration, forgot password, reset password using severless function. Basically creating a membership portal. I can't find sufficient documentation on thi

HubSpot has its own membership portal + accompanying infrastructure. They handle the vast majority of the login/auth flow. And where they don’t, it’s managed within the UI during site setup and/or within modules or theme files. It’s fairly straightforward.

If you have a more complex use case requiring processes that aren’t covered with their membership features, you’ll likely be better served finding outside sources to help inform your build.

As long as you know how serverless function within HubSpot generally, you should be able to adapt that outside information to suit an HS site.

You can read more about memberships <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/data/memberships|here>.
